name: places/ChIJPUkgfBhZwokRvz7rXJlwO7g
formattedAddress: 670 Greenwich St, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 670 Greenwich St, New York, NY 10014, USA

originalText.text: I have lived in NYC my entire adult life and Dr. Kil is the first dermatologist I have "settled down with." The office is gorgeous and the staff is lovely, and the punctuality here is real! I find her to be whip smart, personable, thorough and caring. She and her staff are incredibly accessible - whether by phone or email, they are quick to respond and have been able to accommodate me with last minute appointments. She recommended cost saving alternatives to my big box pharmacy and suggested one nearby that had a much lower co-pay (FACTS - I did the price calculator on my usual pharmacy's site). She was recommended to me by a friend and I too have recommended her to others.

originalText.text: I’ve been seeing Dr. Kil for almost 2 years now and am so grateful for her services. She’s helped alleviate a lot of anxiety around my acne, hair loss and alopecia. She makes me feel heard, has excellent bedside manner and has a very relaxing office. The ladies assisting and at the desk are equally as nice!

originalText.text: Dr. Kil is fantastic! She has helped cleared my adult acne so much in so little time. Great bedside manner and is a true professional. The office staff is great and friendly as well!

text.text: Dr. Kil is fantastic! She has helped cleared my adult acne so much in so little time. Great bedside manner and is a true professional. The office staff is great and friendly as well!

originalText.text: I've gone to this place multiple times because it's so conveniently located and I can get an appointment easily, but every time but one, I've had a bad experience . I've felt rushed every time, felt like an object that's just meant to maximize profit, and don't feel comfortable asking questions. Would it be that big of a deal to have an actual 10 minute appointment when you're charging hundreds of dollars, rather than 4-5 minutes? I actually did ask a question once and got a dismissive non response whereas my male partner goes to the same doctor, asked the same question, and got an actual answer, so I don't know what that's about. I also don't think they know or understand trauma informed care. The office space is nice though and other people seem to have experienced a positive bedside manner.

originalText.text: Love Erin and the staff at New Bloom Dermatology. Erin always puts the patient's needs first, always gives her best medical advices and never takes advantage. She tells me straight if things will not work out for me so I'm not wasting time. Erin is thorough with explaining and answering any questions I may have during my visit. Thank you Erin!
